backstories.description: Fugitives threaten the Supply Situation of the station.
Customs agency ships are inspecting trading vessels.
Pirate ships are threatening transport vessels.
The engines of a vessel failed and life support systems are critical.
An enemy trading vessel is vulnerable and could be plundered.
A spacecraft went missing in the sector of the station.
The station is running out of supplies and would pay a large price.
A Merchant wants to raise Prices by buying out Goods from other Stations.
This Station is wealthy, but others might be less lucky and could use some Investments.

questGivers.description: A large syndicate known for opportunistic deals which drove many stations into poverty and supply shortages.
A merchant who is trying his best to make fair deals. He seems to be well respected by the local population.
A ruthless politician who is known for enforcing his goals and silencing his opponents equally violently.
A member of the council. As he comes toward you he kindly greets some people, most of which reply with a smile.
An ambitious major who would prefer to be a commander.
A man wearing a military uniform who looks deeply worried about something.
A man with a nervous gaze. The locals look after him disdainfully.
A woman in civilian clothes with a desperate facial expression. She is gesturing anxiously.
A mysterious hooded Figure, sitting in the Corner of the Room.
An infamous Pirate who is dreaded on the whole Station and beyond.
A Guerilla Organization with the Aim of overthrowing some tyrannic Rulers in this Sector.
An anarchistic Group trying to destabilize Stations around the Planet to start a Revolution.
A Government Commission for special Duties.

tasks.description: Bribe a Customs Vessels Crew with 200$
Supply 10 Oxygen to a helpless Vessel
Tow a helpless Vessel to the Station
Sell 10 Sanitary Products to the Station
Buy Goods for at least 200$ from other Stations
